hardwareAbstraction
Class NXTRemoteMotor

java.lang.Object
  hardwareAbstraction.NXTRemoteMotor
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteCommands
public class NXTRemoteMotor
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteCommands

Class for handling the remote motor abstraction layer on the master brick. RemoteCommands interface to send the appropriate command id via NXTRemoteCommand over RS485. The receiving end implements NXTRegulatedMotor to carry out the actual commands, once they have been interpreted. Code Sourced from Lejos Forums (http://www.lejos.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=2620)

Author:
cs07cc4

rotateTo

public void rotateTo(int angle,
                     boolean immediateReturn)
Tells the motor to rotate to an angle with respect to its initial starting angle. ImmediateReturn not implemented yet. methods returns once the command is sent

Parameters:
angle - the angle to rotateTo
immediateReturn - if false the method will not return until the rotation is complete. otherwise it will return right away
